text: Guy James Robin (born 2 August 1989), known as Jonas Blue, is an English DJ and record producer. He is best known for his singles "Perfect Strangers", "Fast Car", "Mama" and "Rise". In 2017, he released his compilation album "Jonas Blue: Electronic Nature - The Mix 2017". == References == Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:British DJs Category:English record producers Category:Musicians from London
title: Jonas Blue
